title: Aligning, Autoencoding and Prompting Large Language Models for Novel Disease Reporting
details: F Liu, X Wu, J Huang, B Yang, K Branson, P Schwab… - IEEE Transactions on …, 2025
abstract: Given radiology images, automatic radiology report generation aims to produce informative text that reports diseases. It can benefit current clinical practice in diagnostic radiology. Existing methods typically rely on large-scale medical datasets …
